required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Phase 2 Study of BA058 (Abaloparatide) Transdermal Delivery in Postmenopausal Women With Osteoporosis
clinical_study.official_title: A Randomized, Double-Blind, Placebo-Controlled, Phase 2 Study of BA058 (Abaloparatide) Administered Via a Coated Transdermal Microarray Delivery System (BA058 Transdermal (Abaloparatide Transdermal)) in Healthy Postmenopausal Women With Osteoporosis

brief_summary.textblock: To determine the clinical safety and efficacy of BA058 Transdermal in otherwise healthy postmenopausal women with osteoporosis as assessed by changes in bone mineral density (BMD) and serum markers of bone metabolism when compared to Transdermal Placebo and BA058 Injection for 6 months of treatment.

primary_outcome.description: Change in BMD, using DXA results; active compared to placebo.

secondary_outcome.description: Change in BMD, using DXA results; active compared to placebo.

secondary_outcome.measure: Serum Markers of Bone Formation and Resorption
secondary_outcome.description: Change in laboratory results; active compared to placebo.
Physical examinations, vital signs, electrocardiograms, clinical laboratory tests, local tolerance, and adverse events.

arm_group.description: BA058 (abaloparatide) Transdermal Microneedle Patch 0 mcg daily
BA058 (abaloparatide) Transdermal Microneedle Patch - 100 mcg daily
BA058 (abaloparatide) Transdermal Microneedle Patch - 150 mcg daily

intervention.description: BA058 Transdermal Microneedle Placebo Patch, 0 mcg, daily applications for 6 months
BA058 Transdermal Microneedle Active Patch, 50 mcg, daily applications for 6 months
BA058 Transdermal Microneedle Active Patch, 100 mcg, daily applications for 6 months
BA058 Transdermal Microneedle Active Patch, 150 mcg, daily applications for 6 months
BA058 Subcutaneous Injection, 80 mcg, daily injections for 6 months

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Postmenopausal woman, less than 85 years old.
- BMD T-score ≤ -2.5 of spine or hip (femoral neck) or ≤ -2.0 with previous fracture (within 5 years).
- Normal physical exam, vital signs, electrocardiogram (ECG) and medical history.
- Laboratory tests within the normal range including serum calcium, Vit D, PTH(1-84), serum phosphorus and alkaline phosphatase.
Exclusion Criteria:
- BMD T-score ≤ -5.0 at the lumbar spine or hip.
- History of bone disorders (e.g., Paget's disease) other than postmenopausal osteoporosis.
- Significantly impaired renal function.
- History of any cancer.

certain_agreements.pi_employee: Principal Investigators are NOT employed by the organization sponsoring the study.
certain_agreements.restrictive_agreement: Results may not be published prior to the Study Report completion. Investigators may publish results, providing a manuscript to the Sponsor =/> 30 days prior to its submission to a publisher. Sponsor will provide manuscript to Investigators =/> 30 days prior to its submission. Investigator shall comply with Sponsor's policy, withholding publication for an additional 60 days to permit the Sponsor to obtain patent or other proprietary rights protection, if deemed necessary.
